prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with a green and brown color palette.
Imagine a fairy-type Pokemon that sparkles with pink hues and has floral designs all over its body.
Generate a ghost-type Pokemon that has a haunting presence and is shrouded in dark colors and mist.
Make a dual-type Pokemon that combines fairy and bug features with vibrant wings and a whimsical appearance.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, showcasing earthy tones and delicate, flower-like structures.
Show me a Pokemon that represents nature, featuring soft colors and a gentle demeanor, perfect for forest environments.
Give me a bug and steel-type Pokemon that has a shiny metallic body and intricate patterns.
